LET’S GET SOCIAL!
Follow us for special offers and the latest happenings in the Jungle!

Group Events

The Best Location. Jungle Island provides a great day out for any company or group. Our amazing animals, exciting exhibits and sensational shows make Jungle Island the perfect choice for a company picnic, large group outing or private daytime or evening event. Our event specialists will create your personalized event solution, from extraordinary menus under the direction of Executive Chef Gregg Nuguid, to world class atmospheres and event experiences. From weddings and showers to bar mitzvahs and quinces, we will help you design your dream event. Inquiries Chat Now Gallery of Spaces Private Event Software powered by Tripleseat Chef Gregg Nuguid – Executive Chef With over 30 years of experience in world-class hotels, resorts, and casinos, Chef Nuguid brings a wealth of culinary expertise to Jungle Island. As Executive Chef, he oversees all dining experiences, from daily park offerings to private events and large-scale galas. His passion for innovative cuisine and high-quality ingredients ensures that every meal elevates your Jungle Island experience. Aston H. Ziadie Special Events Senior Manager aziadie@jungleisland.com 305-400-7230 Maria Salinas Events Sales Manager msalinas@jungleisland.com 305-400-7230 Natalia Saavedra Event Sales Coordinator nsaavedra@jungleisland.com 305-400-7230 Carlos Velez, CPCE General Manager, Food & Beverage cvelez@jungleisland.com 305-400-7230 Do you have a site fee for weddings/events at your venue? ﻿ Yes What is the starting site fee for weddings/events during peak season? $2500 What is the starting site fee for weddings/events during oﬀ-peak season? $1500 What is included in the per person price? Food/Bar/Tables/Chairs/Linens/Flatware What is the starting price per person for 4 hours bar service? $42 What is included in the starting price for bar service? deluxe brands, domestic beers, house wine, sodas & juices What is the maximum capacity of your venue? Indoor/Outdoor 5000 How many event spaces or rooms does your venue oﬀer? 10 .entry-content #post-## Jungle Island Group Events Jungle Island Group Events #main
